actionTemplate.title: Blush for Diamond Face
steps: Avoid the highest cheekbone point; start slightly below it
Blend in a soft arc toward the apple of the cheek
Sweep outward to soften prominent cheekbones
Diffuse together with contour/highlight for a seamless finish

rationaleTemplate: Softens prominent cheekbones by placing color lower and blending wide.
An arced blend prevents the cheekbone from looking sharper.
